channel.title: Help With Attack Timer
channel.description: On my server their is no weapon-delay on punching/kicking npcs+other players. How do i add it so their is a weapondelay,or that everytime they punch or kick they hit a 0?Please Help Me, Im a beginner coder and need Help.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2008, 02:26:39 pm[/size][hr]Please Help.
